title: Exeter Data Analytics Hub: Promoting Open and Reproducible Science

yaml.title: Exeter Data Analytics Hub: Promoting Open and Reproducible Science

markdown.headingText: What is the Exeter Data Analytics Hub?
markdown.markdown:
Welcome to the homepage of the Exeter Data Analytics Hub.


We are an inter-college team of volunteers at the University of Exeter aiming to enhance ECR training in open and reproducible science.

## Open and Reproducible Science Series

We host a monthly series of workshops and talks to promote Open and Reproducible Science throughout the life-cycle of a research project.

Visit the [Series](series.html) page to find out more.

## intRos Walkthroughs

Find brief introductions and walkthroughs on common research programming activities on the [Walkthroughs](posts.html) page.

## Old website content

There are a bunch of excellent resources made by previous members of the University of Exeter. These were hosted on a previous version of this website.

- [Introduction to R](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/IntroToR/) by TJ McKinley
- [Advanced Visualisation and Data Wrangling in R](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/AdVis/) [[Data](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/AdVis/dataFiles.zip)] [[Slides](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/AdVis/slides.zip)] by TJ McKinley
- [Open Science and Reproducible Research in R](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/reproducibleScience) by Diego Barneche
- [R Scripting and R Markdown](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/LitProg) [[Data and scripts](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/LitProg/dataFiles.zip)] by TJ McKinley
- [Statistical Modelling in R](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/StatModelling/) [[Data](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/StatModelling/dataFiles.zip)] [[Slides](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/StatModelling/slides.zip)] by JJ Valletta and TJ McKinley
- [Machine Learning](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/MachineLearning) [[Data](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/MachineLearning/data.zip)] [[Slides](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/MachineLearning/slides.zip)][[Slides2019](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/MachineLearning/slides2019.zip)] by Chris Yeomans and Jiangjiao Xu
- [Spatial Data Analysis](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/spatial_data_analysis) [[Data](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/spatial_data_analysis/data.zip)] [[Slides](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/spatial_data_analysis/slides.zip)] by D March, James Duffy & Chris Yeomans
- [ImageJ GUI](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/imagej-gui)
- [ImageJ Macros](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/imagej-macros)
- [Introduction to Python](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/python-intro)
- [Python for Data Analysis](https://exeter-data-analytics.github.io/python-data)

## Contact us

If you want to help contribute to this project or have any questions about any of our content, please do not hesitate to contact us.
